tools.name: Disable-DepartedUser
tools.description: Offboards a departed employee by disabling and archiving their AD account.

DisabledOU.description:
The Distinguished Name of the OU to move disabled accounts to.
Example: "OU=Disabled Users,DC=contoso,DC=com"

SkipHomeFolder.description: Skip the home folder archival step.

ArchivePath.description:
The UNC or local path to archive the user's home folder to.
A subfolder named LastName-FirstName-Date will be created.

LogPath.description: Directory for transcript logs. Defaults to .\Logs.

Identity.description: The SAMAccountName of the user to offboard.

tools.name: Export-ADUserReport
tools.description: Generates a comprehensive Active Directory user report in HTML or CSV format.

Filter.description: AD filter string. Defaults to all enabled users with email addresses.

SearchBase.description: The OU Distinguished Name to scope the search. Defaults to the entire domain.

OutputPath.description: Directory to save the report. Defaults to current directory.

DaysInactive.description: Flag users who haven't logged in within this many days. Defaults to 90.

IncludeDisabled.description: Include disabled accounts in the report.

OutputFormat.description: Output format: HTML, CSV, or Both. Defaults to HTML.

tools.name: New-ADUserFromTemplate
tools.description: Creates a new Active Directory user based on a template account.

EnableAccount.description:
If specified, the account is enabled immediately. Default is disabled
(requiring manual enablement after verification).

TemporaryPassword.description:
A SecureString password for the new account. If not provided, a random
complex password is generated.

LogPath.description: Directory for transcript logs. Defaults to .\Logs.

Department.description: The user's department. If not specified, inherits from the template.

CsvPath.description:
Path to a CSV file for bulk user creation. Expected columns:
FirstName, LastName, Template, Department, Title, OfficePhone, Email

Template.description: The SAMAccountName of the template user to clone settings from.
